department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
# Miscellaneous Groceries Tender

## Request for Proposal

The Public Works and Government Services Canada on behalf of Correctional Service of Canada invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the supply and delivery of Miscellaneous Groceries as per the requirements outlined in this tender.

### Trade Agreement

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### Tendering Procedure

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The tendering procedure is competitive and open to the public.

### Procurement Method

The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.

### Contract Award Criteria

The contract award will be based on the Lowest/Lower Bid.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria are:

* Price
* Quality of goods or services
* Technical specifications
* Commercial and government policy requirements

### Delivery

The delivery date will be specified in the contract.

### Terms and Conditions

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
